quote.name: JB Kempf, President, VideoLAN
quote.text:
"This modern tale is a superb parable, and a perfect illustration of the need for digital freedoms in our daily lives. Here we're talking about skateboards and toys, but tomorrow our whole lives may be limited by monopolist technology companies.
I love the format of this book, as I'm a big fan of comics. But above all, the tone is positive, laughing, and optimistic for the future, so that new generations will be stronger than we have been."
